survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Library Checkout Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from library users on their experience with autonomous checkout systems to improve service efficiency and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the autonomous checkout systems at the library?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency to capture granularity in usage patterns.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the autonomous checkout systems at the library?

questions.question_text: What do you find most convenient about the autonomous checkout system?
answer_options: No need to wait in line
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select to identify key conveniences; include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What do you find most convenient about the autonomous checkout system?
answer_options: No need to wait in line

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any difficulties while using the autonomous checkout system? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback on pain points.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any difficulties while using the autonomous checkout system? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the autonomous checkout system to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure net promoter intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the autonomous checkout system to others?

questions.question_text: What additional features would improve your experience with the autonomous checkout system?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovative suggestions for future enhancements.

script.question_text: What additional features would improve your experience with the autonomous checkout system?
